definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Confidentiality may be particularly stringentin this case.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，保密性显得尤为重要。

sentences.english: All these threat destroys the data's confidentiality . integrity, availability and facticity.
sentences.chinese: 这破坏了数据的保密性，完整性，可用性和真实性。

sentences.english: In this model confidentiality and integrity may also be required.
sentences.chinese: 在此模型中，还可能需要保密性和完整性。

sentences.english: The KEELOQ code hopping technology incorporates high security.
sentences.chinese: KEELOQ滚动码技术具有极高的保密性。

sentences.english: This promotes better customer privacy for sensitive information.
sentences.chinese: 这可以促进客户敏感信息的更好保密性。

sentences.english: Database Confidentiality means that only authorized users can access the data .
sentences.chinese: 数据库保密性是指只有经过授权的用户才能存取数据。

sentences.english: This security enhancement feature supports data confidentiality and data integrity.
sentences.chinese: 改进的安全特性支持数据保密性和数据完整性。

sentences.english: Loss of confidentiality and privacy is one of the major hindrances here.
sentences.chinese: 缺少保密性和隐私性是主要的问题之一。

sentences.english: UAP protocol does not achieve forward secrecy and key-compromise impersonation.
sentences.chinese: UAP协议不具有前向保密性和密钥泄露的安全性。

sentences.english: So it's pointing to China's secretiveness as justification for assuming the worst.
sentences.chinese: 因此它把中国的保密性当作作出最坏假设的理由。

definition: to keep sth confidential/to maintain secrecy
to encrypt/encryption/to protect with a password
